[Crescentia, Arcadia, Arun]

1. The devan remnants were reinforcing the brigands with the Lok believers. has reduced their power, but a secret agent will need to monitor the situation.

2. Bastion of Lok discovered in Oblivion Woods. defeated Tetra Aniask and Murdranak. I will continue to keep an eye on the bastion.

3. The above missions were a success thanks to 's skill and bravery. should be rewarded for exemplary service.
